name: The Mars Odyssey
description:
"Project Ark" the program developed to colonize Mars needs your vision!

Design and organize settlements to make colonies as efficient as possible.

Your high-tech robots and personal virtual assistant "EVA" are ready to help you through this interstellar journey.

Gain knowledge on what leading companies and governmental organizations in space are developing to make the Colonization of Mars possible!

Extremely easy to play, optimized for mobile.

Plan your moves wisely to be the master of this strategy-based space puzzle.

Enjoy!
publishers: Kar-Tek Yapi Endustri Sanayi Ve Ticaret Limited Sirketi
